page.title: 03TOURISM IN MYDDLE
page.content: Most people come to {MYDDLE}because of Richard Gough and the {CASTLE}. {RICHARD GOUGH}lived in the 17th century.His book gave general facts about who sat where in the {Church}and how old they were,where they lived and how much it was worth. The Red Lion public house is made of wooden beams!. {THE CASTLE The castle is made of sand stone and clay.It was built in the 4th century A.D and defended {Myddle}but now there's just the ruins left at {CASTLE farm. {THE RED LION The pub was built in 1600 and it used to be a barn.Now it is very popular!.
